Title: The Vietnamese people resist the American aggressor
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The third sheet of a series of 22 (incomplete). The pictorial exhibition includes quotes by Mao Zedong, photographs and cartoons.A partial translation of the full text of the Mao statement, entitled "Statement Opposing Aggression Against Southern Vietnam and Slaughter of Its People by the U.S.–Ngo Dinh Diem Clique", dated 28 August 1963, can be found here.
Theme: Foreign Friends: North VietnamForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
